info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 11:28AM CDT until May 06 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in southwestern Illinois... West central Greene County in southwestern Illinois... Southeastern Pike County in west central Illinois... East central Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1128 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clarksville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hardin, Pleasant Hill, Clarksville, Belleview, Nebo, Kampsville, Eldred, Hamburg, Mozier, Haypress, Michael, Beecreek, and Walkersville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
